description:
The course goes beyond telling the simple treatments of cough, cold, hypertension, stress, insomnia that every aromatherapy course does. It gives you hands on techniques to build your own home remedies with complete precision, the way a medicine company will do. The course gives you working formulas for hundreds of health conditions, beauty and wellness requirements and many other household requirements, by using just a simple and low cost set of 10 essential oils.

You do not have to buy any oils etc from me, just have a pen/paper to note down things and then do your own experiments when you have arranged the material.

By the time you will complete this course, you are likely to become a friendly advisor with knowledge of hundreds of healing remedies and beauty treatments for your friends and family members.
title: Aromatherapy Formulation Secrets, Revealed
